sentences.en: A copious rain began to fall.
Every star is a copious source of neutrinos.
sentences.cn: 每颗恒星都是丰富的中微子源.

sentences.en: He attended his lectures and took copious notes.
sentences.cn: 他去听他的课，做了大量的笔记。

sentences.en: He could drink copious amounts of beer without ill effect.
sentences.cn: 他可以豪饮啤酒而无不适。

sentences.en: He is possessed of a copious vocabulary.
I went out for a meal last night and drank copious amounts of red wine.
sentences.cn: 我昨晚出去吃饭，喝了很多红酒。

sentences.en: Long before Altamont's arrival, he had done justice to a copious breakfast.
sentences.cn: 早在阿尔塔芒到达之前, 他已吃过丰盛的早餐.

sentences.en: Of everything that he saw he made extremely drawings, which he explained with copious notes.
sentences.cn: 他把看到的东西十分仔细地描绘出来, 还作了大量的注解.

sentences.en: She listened to me and took copious notes .
sentences.cn: 她边听我说话边记下大量笔记。

sentences.en: She supports her theory with copious evidence.
sentences.cn: 她以大量的例证来充实自己的理论.

sentences.en: She took copious notes of the professor's lecture.
sentences.cn: 上教授的课她记了大量的笔记.

sentences.en: The banker's speech was fluent, but it was also copious.
sentences.cn: 银行家的话滔滔不绝, 但也烦琐冗杂.

sentences.en: There has been copious bleeding since I a miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 自从我流产后一直大量出血.

sentences.en: They also have copious amounts of length and depth to surround Roy.
sentences.cn: 他们阵营中还有足够的高度和深度来辅佐罗伊.

sentences.en: Using coke in iron ore reduction produces copious quantities of airborne particulates.
sentences.cn: 炼铁过程中使用焦炭,会在空中形成大量的悬浮粒子.

trans.tran_cn: 丰富的，大量的，多产的，冗长的
trans.tran_en: existing or being produced in large quantities
